title: Designing and Utilizing Personalized Information Packages: Enhancing Science Field Practitioners' Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Targets in-service science professionals to improve work efficiency by learning personalized information package design and application methods. Strengthens customized content delivery and knowledge construction skills through learner-specific information needs analysis

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze and organize personalized information needs tailored to their work environments
Learners can design science-domain task-specific information packages based on analyzed requirements
Learners can apply designed information packages to workplace problem-solving scenarios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
